reviews.title: Massive memory space...
reviews.comment: Great app for learning to pronounce letters and words, if you already know the very basic rules but needs to enable move to SD card.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Very useful application, thanks and keep working
reviews.author: omar abubakr

reviews.title: GREAT for learning Pinyin!!
reviews.comment: Works great in Huawei MediaPad...pronounciation is very clear!! Smple UI yet delivers its purpose.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tool for learning Pinyin
reviews.comment: Great for learning the pronunciation of Pinyin. Could add a test section and sell that version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'m starting to learn mandarin and this app is confusing. Maybe better for someone in intermediate level.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too much space!
reviews.comment: Needs \'move to SD card\'s enabled! Just silly to require this to stay in phone memory.

reviews.comment: Perfect for begineers like me!!!

reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for as a self-study student to translate the pinyin from the flashcards I\'m studying into correct pronunciation.

reviews.comment: Extremely useful when you really, really need to hear the correct pronunciation and there\'s no native speaker on hand!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple pronunciation tool. Plays samples illustrating the 4 tones for every pinyin letter. No lessons. No whole words.
